reason: Issued

-----END CERTIFICATE-----

(intermediate)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
ca.crt: ""
tls.key: |
-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
AaBbCcDd0
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----
